title: Falling For Them, Volume 1
description: Indulge in 10 all-new reverse harem stories from New York Times, USA Today, and bestselling authors, as well as up-and-coming indie authors. This collection of modern, paranormal, and sci-fi romances is sure to satisfy every palate. Whether you love to turn up the heat with a spicy romance, or savor a sweet love story, Falling for Them has it all. On sale for a limited time, all proceeds will go to St. Jude’s Children’s HospitalHelp us make a difference for the new year by doing what you love…meeting our guys.Meeting Them by Rebecca RoyceFinding Nora by Ripley ProserpinaEllie’s Bears by G.E. KellyHouse of Glass by Lyn ForesterLily by R.M. WalkerThe Four Clever Brothers by Amy SumidaOne Greedy Fool by A.S. OrenRaising the Stakes by Autumn Reed and Julia ClarkePrecursor by A.J. AndersFavored by C.L. Stone
author: C.L. Stone
